title: Guild Hall Restoration Complete
body: Master artisans have finished restoring the main hall. Claim a chair by the hearth and compare battle scars with fellow adventurers.
digest: Guild hall renovatedâ€”drop by for camaraderie and quests.

title: Merchants Unpack New Wares
body: Caravans from the southern dunes arrived at dawn. Limited-run curios and reagents are now available at the counter.
digest: Fresh caravan goods stocked inside the guild shop.

title: Town Crier Seeking Tales
body: Bring noteworthy discoveries back to the guild so the crier can spread the news across the realm. Fame favors the talkative.
digest: Share exploits with the crier to gain renown.
